copy.title: Butterfly Painter
copy.host_bubble_2: Spray paint at the butterfly you want to color!
copy.host_bubble_4: Spray the right color paint at each butterfly!
copy.host_bubble_6: Try it again ok? Make sure you paint each butterfly the right color!
copy.tutorial_step1: We need to paint all the butterflies in time for the next season! I built a Paint Sprayer so we can do it faster!
copy.tutorial_step2: Spray paint at the butterfly you want to color. Here, I'll show you!
copy.tutorial_step3: Go ahead, give it a try!
copy.tutorial_step4: Good paint sprayin'! Butterflies come in lots of different colors. You need to paint each one with a color that matches its spots, like this.
copy.tutorial_step4_alt: Butterflies come in lots of different colors. You need to paint each one with a color that matches its spots, like this.
copy.tutorial_step5: You can change colors by clicking the paint pail on top of the Sprayer.
copy.tutorial_step6: You can also change colors by clicking on the paint buckets over here.
copy.tutorial_step7: Watch the clock if you want to earn a bonus!
copy.tutorial_step8: This thingy tells you how many butterflies of each color you need to paint.
copy.tutorial_step9: Try it again, okay? Make sure you paint each butterfly the right color!
copy.tutorial_step10: Well, I think you're ready to start painting butterflies!
copy.easy_story: Let's start with these guys. They can't wait for a fresh coat of paint!
copy.medium_story: Here's a whole bunch of butterflies! Time to get painting!
copy.hard_story: These butterflies will be tricky to paint. You know how butterflies can be!
copy.royal_story: This bunch of butterflies is pretty picky about their colors. This is going to be a real challenge, but I know you can do it!
copy.easy_exitstory: Nice painting! The butterflies love their colors!
copy.allmedium_story: Flitterific start! I knew you'd be great at this!
copy.allhard_story: Flaptastic work! Are you ready for more butterflies?
copy.allroyal_story: Wow, you're GOOD at this! How about one more bunch of butterflies?
copy.game_over_win_0: FLAPTASTIC! That was some amazing painting!
copy.game_over_win_1: You're one flitterific butterfly painter! Come back any time!
copy.game_over_win_2: That was some great painting! Well done!
copy.game_over_win_3: Great job! Thanks for all your help!
copy.game_over_lose_time_0: Good work! Come back soon, okay?
copy.game_over_lose_time_1: Nice painting! Don't forget to come back -- we always need help here!
copy.game_over_lose_time_2: Thanks for all your help! Come back soon, okay?
copy.clock_alert_0: Be careful! Don't run out of time!
copy.life_1: GOOD WORK! You finished in time!
copy.instruction0: Aim the sprayer with your mouse and LEFT click to spray and paint the butterflies before they fly away.
copy.instruction1: Look at the spots on the butterflies' wings to see what color they need to be painted! Change the paint color by clicking on the sprayer.
copy.instruction2: Hit a power up to make painting easier!
copy.instruction3: The beetles will scare the butterflies away. Splat them with paint to get them to move.
copy.instruction4: Some butterflies need to be painted with two different colors!
copy.level_tip_1: Paint the butterflies before they fly away!
copy.level_tip_4: Now there are two different colored butterflies. Make sure you paint them the correct color.
copy.level_tip_6: Hit the ice cubes to make the butterflies stay still.
copy.level_tip_8: Some butterflies need to be painted with TWO sprays of paint before they are complete.
copy.level_tip_10: Crabs sometimes get in your way. Spray them with paint and they will stop moving.
copy.level_tip_12: The beetles will scare the butterflies away. Splat them with paint to get them to move.
copy.level_tip_14: Hit the multi-color paint ball for magic paint!
copy.level_tip_18: Hit the wave paint ball to paint all the butterflies on the screen at once!
copy.level_tip_22: These butterflies need to be painted with two different colors!
copy.loose_a_life_0: Time is up, I'm afraid. Please try again!
copy.host_level_1_0: Let's start off with some easy stuff, okay?
copy.host_level_1_1: Let's start with some slow-flying butterflies.
copy.host_level_1_2: I think we should start slow.
copy.host_level_3_0: Paint 10 butterflies to get a bonus!
copy.host_level_3_1: Be sure to use the right color!
copy.host_level_4_1: Watch the clock thingy to get a bonus!
copy.host_level_5_0: Pay attention to which colors you need!
copy.host_level_6_0: You'll get a bonus if you paint 14 butterflies!
copy.host_level_6_1: Match the paint color to the butterfly's spots!
copy.host_level_8_0: Get ready, a whole bunch of butterflies are coming!
Get the right color on the right butterflies!
copy.host_level_10_1: Paint as quick as you can!
copy.host_level_13_1: Paint fast, there are lots more butterflies!
copy.host_level_14_0: You're helping out A LOT! Thanks!
copy.host_level_15_0: You need to paint 12 butterflies now!
copy.host_level_15_1: Don't let those butterflies flitter away!
copy.host_level_16_0: Don't worry, we won't run out of paint!
copy.host_level_17_0: You're doing great! Keep it up!
copy.host_level_17_1: You're doing good, fly faster now!
copy.host_level_18_0: Aim and spray! Aim and spray!
copy.host_level_18_1: Can you paint every butterfly here? Yes, you can!
copy.host_level_20_0: Can you paint 16 butterflies? I know you can!
copy.host_level_20_1: Don't let those butterflies get away unpainted!
copy.host_level_23_0: Paint all these butterflies for next season!
copy.host_level_24_0: This looks hard, but I know you can do it!
copy.host_level_25_0: Keep track of all those butterflies!
copy.host_level_26_0: You can do it, I know you can!
copy.host_level_28_0: If you paint all of these guys, you'll finish!
copy.emote_0: You're using the Paint Sprayer perfectly!
copy.emote_4: Are you sure you're not an art-talent?
copy.emote_5: This Paint Sprayer works great, doesn't it?
copy.emote_7: I think the butterflies like you!
copy.emote_9: Hey, we're trying to paint here!
copy.emote_12: Whoa, those butterflies are making me dizzy!
copy.emote_15: Remember, try to get those bonus points!
copy.emote_16: Painting butterflies is a serious job!
copy.emote_17: Don't let those tricky butterflies fly away!
copy.emote_19: Make sure you paint the whole butterfly!
copy.emote_21: Oh! That butterfly's name is Harold. Hi, Harold!
copy.emote_22: Teetering teapots, you're better at this than I am!
copy.emote_23: Those butterflies are tricky, aren't they?
copy.emote_26: Hey, that butterfly pulled a prank on me yesterday!
copy.emote_27: Did I invent a good gadget or what?
copy.emote_28: You have plenty of paint, so go go go!
copy.emote_29: Be quick! Those butterflies are fast!
copy.emote_30: Moon and stars, that's a lot of butterflies!
copy.emote_31: I like red butterflies best. No, wait -- yellow! No, green!
copy.emote_32: You're the best paint sprayer I've ever seen!
copy.emote_34: Swing my hammer, you're good at this!
copy.emote_35: Keep your eyes open and your wings flapping!
copy.emote_38: Hey, butterflies, we're trying to help here!
copy.emote_40: Get the right colors on the right butterflies!
copy.emote_41: The butterflies aren't making this easy, huh?
copy.emote_42: These butterflies will brighten up the mainland!
copy.emote_43: There's no time to rest! Keep painting!
